EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-12-14
EmailTemplate.subject: Software Development in a Galaxy Far, Far Away
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
december 14, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/t-mobiles-same-day-test-deploy-and-production-transformation-714e6ab7d0f1?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> T-Mobile’s Same-Day Test, Deploy, and Production Transformation On the day of the iPhone X release, Apple, Sprint, and AT&T’s sites went down. T-Mobile’s didn’t. Learn why <[[https://builttoadapt.io/t-mobiles-same-day-test-deploy-and-production-transformation-714e6ab7d0f1?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/software-development-in-a-galaxy-far-far-away-5c7a8f5a1a4d?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Software Development In a Galaxy Far, Far Away Explaining Waterfall and Agile development with lasers and explosions. Check it out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/software-development-in-a-galaxy-far-far-away-5c7a8f5a1a4d?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/introducing-greenplum-5-3?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Introducing Pivotal Greenplum 5.3 We're excited to announce the release of Pivotal Greenplum 5.3. Find out more <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/introducing-greenplum-5-3?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment/home?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/a-look-back-at-springone-platform-2017-ep-52?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> A Look Back at SpringOne Platform 2017 (Ep. 52) In this episode of Pivotal Insights, Jeff and Dormain are joined by Pieter Humphrey and Dan Baskette to recap all the announcements, share favorite moments, highlight favorite keynotes and breakout sessions, and provide a quick review of the food. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/a-look-back-at-springone-platform-2017-ep-52?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/john-heveran?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> John Heveran at SpringOne Platform 2017 John Heveran talks Liberty Mutual and their transformation journey at SpringOne Platform 2017. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/john-heveran?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/github-scales-out-its-better-code-vision-6b012ec0fe69?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> GitHub Scales Out Its Better Code Vision Jason Warner of GitHub talks about meeting the growing appetite for GitHub tools in the enterprise at SpringOne Platform 2017. Getting Devs to Write Better Code <[[https://builttoadapt.io/github-scales-out-its-better-code-vision-6b012ec0fe69?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/phil-webb-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Phillip Webb at SpringOne Platform 2017 Phillip Webb gives an update on the state of Spring Framework at SpringOne Platform 2017. The Only Constant is Change <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/phil-webb-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 12/19 Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.0: A First Look, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-19-pivotal-cloud-foundry-2-0-a-first-look-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=pcf-2.0-announce-q417]]>

1/11 Secrets of Successful Digital Transformers, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-11-secrets-of-successful-digital-transformers-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=siblings-pcf-q118]]>
1/16-1/18 Pivotal Cloud Foundry Developer Training Course, Chicago <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1092]]>
